titleStmt.title: Ordinances set foorth by the King for the rule and gouernement of his Maiesties men of warre. Read and published at Caen the 30. of March. 1591. Faithfully translated out of the French coppie printed at Caen by E.A.
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1589-1610 : Henry IV)
Aggas, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Wolfe, and are to be solde at his shop right ouer-against the great south doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Edward Aggas, from the original French.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop right ouer-against the great south doore of Paules
